    • registerUser

      void registerUser(int userId) throws UserNotApprovedException
      Register a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to be registered.
      Throws:
      UserNotApprovedException - if user registration is not approved.

    • modifyCourseDetails

      void modifyCourseDetails(String courseId, int userId, String description)
      Modify course details.
      Parameters:
      courseId - ID of the course to be modified.
      userId - ID of the user performing the modification.
      description - New description of the course.
